sentences.en: At least we don't have to worry about Harbour Pointe any more.
sentences.cn: 起码来说,我们不必再为波因特港工程劳心费力.

sentences.en: Female ballet candidates please bring pointe shoes and wear leotards.
sentences.cn: 芭蕾舞女考生须带备脚尖鞋及穿著贴身舞衣.

sentences.en: Female ballet candidates please bring pointe shoes.
sentences.cn: 芭蕾舞女考生须带备脚尖鞋.

sentences.en: These are the boys of Pointe du Hoc.
sentences.cn: 这些就是奥克角的孩子.

trans.tran_en: if  ballet  dancers are on pointe, they are dancing on the ends of their toes with their feet in a vertical position
